# [Interview #977: Cosmere Q&A - 17th Shard, Entry #118](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=977#118)

#### Odium's\_Shard

Is the Cognitive realm the only way to access the Spiritual Realm from the Physical Realm, and vice versa?

#### Brandon Sanderson

No.
